feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 4:32PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...LIGHT FREEZING RAIN POSSIBLE FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... A weak front could bring light freezing rain and trace ice accumulations as it moves across Kuskokwim Delta late Wednesday into Thursday. Precipitation chances will be around 30-50% during this time.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 4:24PM AKST until November 23 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM AKST THURSDAY FROM DILLINGHAM AND NORTH... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Bristol Bay, from Dillingham north.

entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida...
